1.content: Research content creation workflows and platform requirements
1.details:
1. Research YouTube longform video requirements (length, format, thumbnails)
2. Research TikTok/Instagram short-form requirements (vertical format, duration limits)
3. Research social media text content best practices for X, LinkedIn
4. Analyze video scene segmentation and timing strategies
5. Document platform-specific content adaptation strategies
6. Research comment scraping techniques for feedback analysis
7. Study meta-tagging systems for content libraries

2.content: Design system architecture and content pipeline
2.details:
1. Design idea-to-script AI generation workflow
2. Plan video generation workflow (script → scenes → video)
3. Design audio pipeline (text-to-speech + background music)
4. Plan content adaptation logic for different platforms
5. Design file organization and output structure
6. Create database schema for storing scripts, scenes, and generated content
7. Design content library with meta-tagging system (specific + generic tags)
8. Plan comment scraping and feedback analysis system

3.content: Set up core automation pipeline with AI services
3.details:
1. Load required toolkits (audio_kit, video_kit, image_gen)
2. Implement idea-to-script AI generation
3. Create text-to-speech integration for voiceovers
4. Integrate background music generation/selection
5. Implement video generation from scenes
6. Build content library with scene storage and meta-tagging
7. Create file management system for outputs

4.details:
1. Create YouTube longform video processor (combine scenes, optimize for duration)
2. Build TikTok/Instagram short-form extractor (select best scenes, create vertical format)
3. Implement text content generator for social media posts
4. Create thumbnail generation for video content
5. Add captions/subtitles generation capability
6. Build scene extraction and re-use system from content library

5.content: Create user interface and workflow management
5.details:
1. Build web interface for idea input and content generation
2. Create progress tracking and status updates
3. Implement preview functionality for generated content
4. Add download/batch export features
5. Create content library and organization system with search/filter by meta-tags
6. Build scene management interface (save, tag, reuse scenes)
7. Add content analytics and performance tracking

6.content: Implement comment scraping and feedback system
6.details:
1. Build comment scraping functionality for published content
2. Create sentiment analysis for comment feedback
3. Implement feedback-driven content improvement suggestions
4. Build analytics dashboard for content performance
5. Create automatic content optimization based on feedback patterns
6. Add A/B testing capabilities for content variations

7.content: Test system and optimize content quality
7.details:
1. Test with sample ideas across different content types
2. Test scene re-use and meta-tagging system
3. Optimize audio quality and synchronization
4. Fine-tune video generation parameters
5. Test content adaptation across platforms
6. Test comment scraping and feedback analysis
7. Implement quality assurance checks
8. Create user documentation and usage examples
